DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine long term effect ultra-violet filtering contact lenses macular pigment density ( MPOD ) accommodative function .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Health Benefits Ultra-Violet Filtering Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject adapt soft contact lens wearer least 5 year duration either UV filter contact lens nonUV filter contact lens The subject must report wear contact lens , average , minimum 5 day week . The subject must best correct visual acuity 6/7.5 good eye . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must read sign statement inform consent The subject must 18 43 year age On medication know affect accommodation Active ocular surface pathology Had eye surgery Significant ocular tissue anomaly Any medical condition may prejudicial study Diabetes
